Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory264.png'}
{3: 'After completing the immersion process and removing the obstructive data wall, the four of you arrive at Parliament Square in the virtual space.'}
{3: 'Have you not remembered being pushed into the frame, you would have felt as if you were "teleported" to Parliament Square directly from the bridge.'}
{3: '...But, for some reason, something does not feel the same.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It looks like... some things have formed a wall.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Strange... I can\'t use my sensor to detect what the "wall" is made out of.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "...It's data. It's a flowing wall of white-noise-like data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You can understand it as a wall formed from the data stream. It's one of the anti-interference protocols.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like it really has been infiltrated...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm afraid so. We can only find a way to close or go through it once the immersion process is complete.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...How do we do that?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Like I just said... We have to "find" a way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'A few days ago.'}
{3: 'A young man with blonde hair stood before the doorway to the conference room. Seeing that the door was ajar, he softly took a breath, then knocked on the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Commander Nikola, is there something... Oh, President Hassen. Seems like you've been quite busy recently. I haven't had a chance to speak with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen refrained from responding to Murray. Instead, he motioned Murray to take a seat on the other side of the table.'}
{3: 'Murray sat opposite to Hassen, with a cup of coffee placed in front of him.'}
{3: 'Murray looked at Hassen through the steam coming from the coffee, then blinked awkwardly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "There's no need to be nervous. Celica brewed the coffee herself.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hearing this, Murray smiled and took a sip of the coffee.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Thank you. Tastes... good.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Standing off to the side, Nikola put down his now empty cup, then turned on the holo-screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "I told you, Hassen. He's fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Let's get down to business.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Nikola's gesture, Murray shifted his gaze to the content on the holo-screen."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'This... this is the report I submitted to you. Is President Hassen here with you because there is an issue with it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Not with the information itself. What concerns me is how you got it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Holding the coffee cup, Murray came to a halt and stayed silent.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Still not willing to tell us how you got your hands on this information?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Well... I'd like to live a little longer.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray answered softly with a slightly apologetic tone. However, Hassen understood that the young man would not come clean.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "In that case, why don't you transfer back? It would be better for someone in your condition.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Thank you for your concern, Mr. President. But I'm happy with my current job. I'm not considering a transfer right now.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Murray', 3: "My intelligence work is just a way for me to accumulate combat experience. After all, my physical condition... doesn't allow me to become a commandant with boots on the ground.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "In some ways, I'm happy with the work you produce, and I don't intend to transfer you elsewhere. You're also the only person besides the Gray Raven Commandant who passes the test currently.", 4: '2'}
{3: "So you should understand that, even if the source of your intel violates our rules, we won't sentence you to death for this.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Murray looked down at his reflection in the coffee cup, obscuring his expression from the two men sitting opposite him.'}
{3: 'He quickly raised his head again, then the corners of his mouth curled into a gentle, peculiar smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Sir, I was given a mission, and I completed it. That's all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Just as I won't ask you how you will use this information, you won't have to inquire the details on how I obtain information.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "You wouldn't have the authority to ask.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We know that what you're doing, at least in terms of results, are still for the benefit of Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'We seek a common goal. However...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Murray, no matter how many moves you can make behind the scenes, don't you think they can remain hidden forever.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I think you can gauge where the lines are, at least for the time being.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Thank you to both of you for your trust.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "You've worked under me for quite some time, but I must admitâ€”I still haven't had you figured out.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola took out a black folder from a briefcase under the table and pushed it across to Murray.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If you're unwilling to divulge the source of your intel, the least you can do is be of use.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'What do you want me to do?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'As always, what you do best.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Murray immediately noticed the logo on the file. He let out an apparent smile, then looked up at Nikola.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "...I'm not your only bet in this game, am I?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Just make sure you get the job done.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We just want to see results that benefit Babylonia. That's all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You can put down your cup of coffee now. You don't have to keep holding it if it isn't to your liking.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After that, Hassen and Nikola stood up and left the conference room, leaving Murray with his coffee, unsure whether or not to drink it.'}
{3: 'After quite some time, he finally took a deep breath and smiled bitterly as if being relieved of a heavy burden.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "That... wasn't very pleasant at all.", 4: '1'}
